segments.text: Tonight is a party night ! What drinks do you think we need ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , not everyone wants to drink beer . Make sure there are some soft drinks and juice . Nothing ’ s as refreshing as iced drinks on a hot day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I don ’ t think we need too much in the way of soft drinks . Two super bottles of Cola should cover everyone . What about wine ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Just buy a cask of wine . Have you bought ice yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , once I fill the tub with beer , I ’ ll get the ice . The beer will be cool if you put the tub under the ice . The cooler , the better .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I think a bottle of champagne would be a good idea . It ’ s appetizing and tasty .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , if you say so . Personally speaking , I ’ d rather die of thirst than drink champagne .
segments.speaker: S1
